Package market.assets.marketIndex

Class DynamicMarketIndex

java.lang.Object
market.assets.Asset
market.assets.marketIndex.MarketIndex
market.assets.marketIndex.DynamicMarketIndex
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, CompanyObserver, Searchable
public class DynamicMarketIndex extends MarketIndex implements CompanyObserver
Extension of simple market index. This is dynamic. It means if some company changes it's value the index may change also
